Uses of Interface
net.objectzoo.ebc.SendsSignal

  • Packages that use SendsSignal 
    Package Description
    net.objectzoo.ebc
    This package contains interfaces that can be used to define EBCs.
    net.objectzoo.ebc.builder
    This package contains an internal flow builder DSL implementation that can be used to combine EBCs to flows
    net.objectzoo.ebc.impl
    This package contains base classes that can be used to implement EBCs and boards.
    net.objectzoo.ebc.join
    This package contains some ready to use Join EBCs as well as base classes that can be used to implement own specialized Join subclasses.
    net.objectzoo.ebc.split
    This package contains EBCs that allow to split EBC flows.
    net.objectzoo.ebc.state.async
    This package contains implementations that are used to implement state holding mechanisms for EBCs executed in asynchronous flows.

    • Uses of SendsSignal in net.objectzoo.ebc

      Subinterfaces of SendsSignal in net.objectzoo.ebc 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  ProcessAndSignalFlow<ProcessParameter>
      An EBC that is capable of processing input with a possible outcome of a signal being sent.
      interface  StartAndSignalFlow
      An EBC that is capable of being invoked with a possible outcome of a signal being sent.

    • Uses of SendsSignal in net.objectzoo.ebc.builder

      Methods in net.objectzoo.ebc.builder with parameters of type SendsSignal 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static SendsSignalConnector Flow.await​(SendsSignal flow)
      The flow started with this method waits for the signal event of the given SendsSignal and then continues with whatever is attached to the returned SendsSignalConnector.
      SendsSignalConnector NewFlowConnector.await​(SendsSignal flow)
      Waits for the signal event of the given SendsSignal and then continues with whatever is attached to the returned SendsSignalConnector.

    • Uses of SendsSignal in net.objectzoo.ebc.impl

      Classes in net.objectzoo.ebc.impl that implement SendsSignal 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ProcessAndSignalBase<ProcessParameter>
      A base class for an EBC that CanProcess and SendsSignal.
      class  ProcessAndSignalBoard<ProcessParameter>
      A base class for a board that CanProcess and SendsSignal.
      class  SignalBase
      A base class for an EBC that SendsSignal.
      class  SignalBoard
      A base class for a board that SendsSignal.
      class  StartAndSignalBase
      A base class for an EBC that CanStart and SendsSignal.
      class  StartAndSignalBoard
      A base class for a board that CanStart and SendsSignal.

    • Uses of SendsSignal in net.objectzoo.ebc.join

      Classes in net.objectzoo.ebc.join that implement SendsSignal 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  JoinSignals
      This is a special flow EBC implementation that joins together two signal flows.

    • Uses of SendsSignal in net.objectzoo.ebc.split

      Classes in net.objectzoo.ebc.split that implement SendsSignal 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  SplitProcessToSignal<Parameter>
      The SplitProcessToSignal distributes the process and its parameter to multiple regular subscribers and to multiple signal subscribers.
      class  SplitSignal
      The SplitSignal distributes the signal to multiple subscribers.

    • Uses of SendsSignal in net.objectzoo.ebc.state.async

      Classes in net.objectzoo.ebc.state.async that implement SendsSignal 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  StartAndClearThreadLocalStateStore
      This class implements a decorator EBC that simply forwards the processing to the next component in the flow and clears the ThreadLocalStateStore after the flows execution.
